title: PMDG 747 For FSX 2.10 crack
description:
I've been running PMDG's 747X version 2 for FSX a few days just fine, and then I installed PMDG's MD11 for FSX and suddenly 747 stopped working.  I expanded someone elses idea for the reg fix and the modification of the aircraft.cfg.  I created a reg key for simplicity sake.  Double click the reg key and it will automatically import the needed info into the appropriate place for your PMDG 747X.  Then you must insert that key below into your aircraft.cfg of the 747-400 and 747-400f.  After you do this You can then update your PMDG 747 to 2.10...Sweet!!!! NO MORE BLACK SCREENS!!!  Put the PMDOptions.DLL file in main FSX/PMDG/dlls

[AFDSAuth] <--------------YOU WILL ALREADY HAVE THIS SECTION IN YOUR CFG
---BEGIN SHA1---        
6C5C0C61209E5C8B6C49C0CBCD2526CD2A526C28 <--------PUT THIS KEY IN JUST LIKE YOU SEE HERE
---END SHA1---


Like I said I just expanded on the idea from someone else...I'm just doing what I can to help the scene.
My gaming computer is not online, so I do not know if the program does online checks for blacklisted keys.

I also took someone elses advice on the forums to put a fake email, user, and password when installing...I also used 21 random numeric characters for password.

Sylas
